functionDecorators.name: flashFee
functionDecorators.description: From ERC-3156. The fee to be charged for a given loan.

returnDecorators.description: The amount of `token` to be charged for the loan, on top of the returned principal.

functionDecorators.name: flashLoan
functionDecorators.description: From ERC-3156. Loan `amount` tokens to `receiver`, which needs to return them plus fee to this contract within the same transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: receiver
parameterDecorators.description: The contract receiving the tokens, needs to implement the `onFlashLoan(address user, uint256 amount, uint256 fee, bytes calldata)` interface.

parameterDecorators.name: userData
parameterDecorators.description: A data parameter to be passed on to the `receiver` for any custom use.

functionDecorators.name: flashSupply
functionDecorators.description: From ERC-3156. The amount of currency available to be lended.

returnDecorators.description: The amount of `token` that can be borrowed.

functionDecorators.name: getPairAddress
functionDecorators.description: Get the Uniswap Pair that will be used as the source of a loan. The opposite token will be Weth, except for Weth that will be Dai.

returnDecorators.description: The Uniswap V2 Pair that will be used as the source of the flash loan.

functionDecorators.name: uniswapV2Call
functionDecorators.description: Uniswap flash loan callback. It sends the value borrowed to `receiver`, and expects that the value plus the fee will be transferred back.
